name: single-spa-login-example-with-npm-packages
description: Single-spa application example which imports registered applications from NPM packages and manages authentication features as login.

scripts.bootstrap:apps: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n AUTH,LAYOUT,HOME,ANG,VUE,REACT "npm --prefix ../single-spa-auth-app install" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-layout-app install" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-home-app install" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-angular-app install" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-vue-app install" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-react-app install"
scripts.dev:build:apps: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n AUTH-B,LAYOUT-B,HOME-B,ANG-B,VUE-B,REACT-B "npm --prefix ../single-spa-auth-app run build -- --mode development" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-layout-app run build -- --mode development" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-home-app run build -- --mode development --watch" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-angular-app run build:single-spa -- --watch" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-vue-app run build -- --mode development" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-react-app run build -- --mode development --watch"
scripts.dev:serve:apps: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n AUTH-S,LAYOUT-S,HOME-S,ANG-S,VUE-S,REACT-S "npx http-server ../single-spa-auth-app/dist -p 4201 -c-1 --cors" "npx http-server ../single-spa-layout-app/dist -p 4202 -c-1 --cors" "npx http-server ../single-spa-home-app/dist -p 4203 -c-1 --cors" "npx http-server ../single-spa-angular-app/dist -p 4204 -c-1 --cors" "npx http-server ../single-spa-vue-app/dist -p 4205 -c-1 --cors" "npx http-server ../single-spa-react-app/dist -p 4206 -c-1 --cors"
scripts.serve: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n "ROOT,BUILD,SERVE-MFES" "npm run serve:root" "npm run dev:build:apps" "npm run dev:serve:apps"
scripts.build:apps: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n AUTH,LAYOUT,HOME,ANG,VUE,REACT "npm --prefix ../single-spa-auth-app run build" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-layout-app run build" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-home-app run build" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-angular-app run build:single-spa" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-vue-app run build" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-react-app run build"
scripts.lint-all:strict: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n AUTH,LAYOUT,HOME,ANG,VUE,REACT "npm --prefix ../single-spa-auth-app run lint" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-layout-app run lint" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-home-app run lint" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-angular-app run lint" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-vue-app run lint" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-react-app run lint"
scripts.lint-all:loose: concurrently -n AUTH,LAYOUT,HOME,ANG,VUE,REACT "npm --prefix ../single-spa-auth-app run lint || exit 0" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-layout-app run lint || exit 0" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-home-app run lint || exit 0" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-angular-app run lint || exit 0" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-vue-app run lint || exit 0" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-react-app run lint || exit 0"
scripts.start: npm run build:apps && npm run build && node server.js

author: Juan Manuel LÃ³pez Pazos
